dct_title_s: Hammond's unabridged map of Israel / C.S. Hammond & Company.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by spot heights. "Israel is shown according to the terms of the Israeli-Jordanian and Israeli-Egyptian armistice agreements." Map shows capitals of countries, district capitals, international boundaries, district boundaries, and sub-district boundaries. Includes districts and sub-districts of former Palestinian Mandate.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York, N.Y.]: C.S. Hammond and Co., [1948?]
